❓ Frequently Asked Questions

Get answers to common questions about DevTools, our developer utilities, privacy, and more.

General Questions

Is DevTools completely free?

+

Yes, DevTools is completely free to use. All our developer tools are available without any cost, registration, or premium tiers. We believe in keeping essential developer tools accessible to everyone in the developer community.

Is my data safe? Do you store any information?

+

Your data is 100% safe. All processing happens entirely in your browser (client-side). We never send your data to our servers, store any information, or track your usage. Your privacy is our top priority.

Which tools are available on DevTools?

+

We offer 15+ developer tools including:

  • JWT Parser & Validator
  • JSON Formatter & Validator
  • Unix Time Converter
  • Base64 Encoder/Decoder
  • URL Encoder/Decoder
  • Hash Generator (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256)
  • Password Generator
  • UUID Generator
  • Curl Request Builder
  • RSA Key Generator & Encryption
  • Symmetric Encryption Tools
  • JSON Diff Tool
  • YAML Diff Tool
  • IP Address Checker

Do I need to install anything?

+

No installation required! DevTools works entirely in your web browser. Just visit our website and start using any tool immediately. It works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with modern browsers.

Technical Questions

Can I use DevTools offline?

+

Yes! DevTools has PWA (Progressive Web App) capabilities and service worker caching. After your first visit, many tools will work offline. You can also bookmark the page for quick access.

Which browsers are supported?

+

DevTools works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and mobile browsers. We recommend using the latest version for the best experience.

Is the source code available?

+

Yes! DevTools is open source. You can view, contribute, and fork the code on our GitHub repository. We welcome contributions from the community.

Support & Community

How can I support DevTools?

+

You can support DevTools by:

  • Making a donation via our donate page
  • Starring our GitHub repository
  • Sharing the tools with other developers
  • Reporting bugs or suggesting features
  • Contributing to the open-source project

How can I report bugs or request features?

+

You can report bugs or request features through:

  • GitHub Issues on our repository
  • Email us at support@tools.khanhnd.com
  • Contact us via our contact page

🤔 Still have questions?

If you couldn't find the answer you're looking for, we're here to help!
